text: ma almasih abn maryam ealayh alslam 'iilaa rswl kaman taqadumah min alrsl, w'ummuh qad saddaqt tsdyqana jazmana elmana wemla wahuma kghyrhma min albashar yhtajan 'iilaa alteam, wala yakun 'ilhana man yahtaj 'iilaa altaeam lyeysh. ftammal -ayha alrswl- hal hwla' alkfar. laqad wdhna alelamat aldalt ealaa whdanytna, wbutlan ma yaddaewnh fi 'anbia' allh. thuma hum mae dhlk yadillun ean alhaqi aladhi nahdyhm 'ilyh, thuma anzur kayf yusrfwn ean alhaqu baed hdha albyan?
